author: Jamala Diggle
content: Hi everyone. 3 weeks in to carnivore and was wondering what people do for bad breath? Can't use sugar gum or mints and sugar free have too many crappy ingredients. Thanks!

replies.reply_by: bad breath is more of a sign of dehydration than it is carnivore related in most cases
Can be the body expelling excess ketones you might have bad breath until you 're fully fat adapted it Can take up to 3 months

replies.content: Awesome! Thank you all for your comments!

replies.reply_by: Flossing becomes more important than usual because tiny bits of meat can get stuck and cause issues
We are using Epic gum and Epic toothpaste only available online though. All others we found have sorbitol which is not good for your teeth and gums.

replies.content: A drop or two of peppermint oil

replies.reply_by: Ketone breath , it will deminish over time
Peppermint oil. When you lose fat, it gets expired as acetone. Google keto breath. It will pass. It's actually a good thing.
Rinse your mouth with bicarb soda after brushing your teeth
You can try chewing fresh mint leaves if you like herbs
